description: Try our easy to follow Mexican-Style Chilli Veg Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican-Style Chilli Veg Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g no added salt black beans, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over high heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until softened. Add garlic, oregano, zest, mince and chilli powder and cook, breaking up mince with a wooden spoon, for 4 minutes or until browned. Stir in beans, peppers, canned tomatoes and 1 1/2 cups water. Cook for 10-12 minutes or until reduced and thickened. Add orange juice.
Arrange lettuce, mince, tomato and avocado into bowls. Serve with corn chips, orange wedges, coriander extra chilli powder.
